name: Soscribe
tag_list: social-assistance, filter, monitor, social-networking, social-media, social-web
overview:
Soscribe is a social networking assistant. It simplifies the online social experience by filtering social network(s) and monitors the social web for relevant new content.

Soscribe uses email or phone alerts to send out notifications. Latest relevant tweets/status updates are sent directly to users based on the filters they create.

Filters are designed to choose which user(s) to subscribe to, or alternatively, for a topic to be selected and monitored across multiple social networking feeds/streams. Frequency of notification are then set to send out email or phone alerts in order for the user to stay informed.

Some handy uses of Soscribe Alerts include, monitoring a developing news story, staying current with family and friends, getting the latest on a celebrity or event, and/or keeping tabs on favorite sport teams.
